name: Stein v. Arjay Machine Company, Appellant

judges: Before Jones C. J., Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno, Arnold, Jones and Coi-ien, JJ. .
parties: Stein v. Arjay Machine Company, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion
per Curiam,
The decree of the Court below is affirmed on the opinion by Judge Beimel of the Court of Common Pleas No. 5 of Philadelphia County. Costs to be divided between appellant and appellee.
opinions.author: per Curiam,

attorneys: Samuel R. Wurtman, with him Robert J. Bond, Jr., for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
Stein v. Arjay Machine Company, Appellant.
Argued November 12, 1957.
Before Jones C. J., Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno, Arnold, Jones and Coi-ien, JJ. .
Samuel R. Wurtman, with him Robert J. Bond, Jr., for appellant.
Lenar.d L. Wolffe, for appellee.
January 6, 1958:
